Uses of Class
com.piggybox.utils.tree.TreeNode

  • Packages that use TreeNode 
    Package Description
    com.piggybox.utils.tree
    Java tree utility to help create Pig UDFs

    • Uses of TreeNode in com.piggybox.utils.tree

      Methods in com.piggybox.utils.tree that return TreeNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TreeNode TreeNode.deepCopy()
      Makes a deep copy of not only the Tree structure but of the user object as well.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getChild(int index)
      Returns the child at the specified index in this node's child array.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getChildAfter(TreeNode aChild)
      Returns the child in this node's child array that immediately follows aChild, which must be a child of this node.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getChildBefore(TreeNode aChild)
      Returns the child in this node's child array that immediately precedes aChild, which must be a child of this node.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getFirstChild()
      Returns this node's first child.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getFirstLeaf()
      Finds and returns the first leaf that is a descendant of this node -- either this node or its first child's first leaf.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getLastChild()
      Returns this node's last child.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getLastLeaf()
      Finds and returns the last leaf that is a descendant of this node -- either this node or its last child's last leaf.
      static TreeNode TreeUtils.getLowestCommonAncestor(TreeNode t1, TreeNode t2)
      returns the node of a tree which represents the lowest common ancestor of nodes t1 and t2 dominated by root.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getNextSibling()
      Returns the next sibling of this node in the parent's children array.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getParent()
      Returns this node's parent or null if this node has no parent.
      Methods in com.piggybox.utils.tree that return types with arguments of type TreeNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<TreeNode> TreeNode.breadthFirstIterator()
      Creates and returns an iterator that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in breadth-first order.
      java.util.List<TreeNode> TreeNode.breadthFirstList() 
      java.util.List<TreeNode> TreeNode.children() 
      java.util.Iterator<TreeNode> TreeNode.childrenIterator()
      Creates and returns a forward-order iterator of this node's children.
      java.util.Iterator<TreeNode> TreeNode.depthFirstIterator()
      Creates and returns an iterator that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in depth-first order.
      java.util.List<TreeNode> TreeNode.getDominationPath(TreeNode t)
      Returns the path of nodes leading down to a dominated node, including this and the dominated node itself.
      java.util.List<TreeNode> TreeNode.getLeaves()
      returns the leaves in a Tree in the order by the natural left to right.
      java.util.List<TreeNode> TreeNode.getPathFromRoot()
      Returns the path from the root, to get to this node.
      java.util.List<TreeNode> TreeNode.getPathToRoot()
      Returns the path from this node to the root.
      java.util.Iterator<TreeNode> TreeNode.iterator() 
      java.util.Iterator<TreeNode> TreeNode.leavesIterator() 
      java.util.Iterator<TreeNode> TreeNode.postorderIterator()
      Creates and returns an iterator that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in postorder.
      java.util.List<TreeNode> TreeNode.postorderList() 
      java.util.Iterator<TreeNode> TreeNode.preorderIterator()
      Creates and returns an iterator that traverses the subtree rooted at this node in preorder.
      java.util.List<TreeNode> TreeNode.preorderList() 
      Methods in com.piggybox.utils.tree with parameters of type TreeNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TreeNode.add(int childIndex, TreeNode newChild)
      Removes newChild from its present parent (if it has a parent), sets the child's parent to this node, and then adds the child to this node's child array at index childIndex.
      void TreeNode.add(TreeNode newChild)
      Removes newChild from its parent and makes it a child of this node by adding it to the end of this node's child array.
      boolean TreeNode.dominates(TreeNode anotherNode)
      Returns true if anotherNode is dominated by this node.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getChildAfter(TreeNode aChild)
      Returns the child in this node's child array that immediately follows aChild, which must be a child of this node.
      TreeNode TreeNode.getChildBefore(TreeNode aChild)
      Returns the child in this node's child array that immediately precedes aChild, which must be a child of this node.
      java.util.List<TreeNode> TreeNode.getDominationPath(TreeNode t)
      Returns the path of nodes leading down to a dominated node, including this and the dominated node itself.
      static TreeNode TreeUtils.getLowestCommonAncestor(TreeNode t1, TreeNode t2)
      returns the node of a tree which represents the lowest common ancestor of nodes t1 and t2 dominated by root.
      int TreeNode.indexOf(TreeNode aChild)
      Returns the index of the specified child in this node's child array.
      boolean TreeNode.isNodeAncestor(TreeNode anotherNode)
      Returns true if anotherNode is an ancestor of this node -- if it is this node, this node's parent, or an ancestor of this node's parent.
      boolean TreeNode.isNodeChild(TreeNode aNode)
      Returns true if aNode is a child of this node.
      boolean TreeNode.isNodeSibling(TreeNode anotherNode)
      Returns true if anotherNode is a sibling of (has the same parent as) this node.
      static int TreeUtils.leftEdge(TreeNode t, TreeNode root)
      Returns the positional index of the left edge of a tree t within a given root, as defined by the size of the yield of all material preceding t.
      void TreeNode.remove(TreeNode aChild)
      Removes aChild from this node's child array, giving it a null parent.
      static int TreeUtils.rightEdge(TreeNode t, TreeNode root)
      Returns the positional index of the right edge of a tree t within a given root, as defined by the size of the yield of all material preceding t plus all the material contained in t.
      void TreeNode.setParent(TreeNode newParent)
      Sets this node's parent to newParent but does not change the parent's child array.
      static java.lang.String TreeString.toString(TreeNode tree) 
      static java.lang.String PtbString.toString(TreeNode tree)
